text:
I have chosen to talk about the new technology that is really helpfull in athletism.
It is the new nike shoes with carbones soles. They are expensive i don't remind how much they were but it was around 250 euros.
So u can imagine that a lot of people can purshase it because it's not that expensive. For example someone who is practicing running since 5 years acquire a good level  and it will be normal if he wants to buy i new pair of running shoes. The average price for quality shoes is around 150 euros. So if you want the "must have", you just have to economise 100 euros or asking to your parents or your family for your birthday to help you.
So, it's a new technology wich isn't that far from all it's not only for wealth or rich persons.
Thanks to this invention you can run 4 percent faster than with an usual pair of shoe without costing you more energy. The benefits of them aren't really consequent but when you are at a huge level and in competition they are way to strong and helpfull. In some championship they are forbiden for the athletes because they are considered has cheat.
 There are many consequences about this invention.
First of all, some people think that is cheating
Furthermore, they can help people to be more performant
They are also a bit hard to run with when you haven't experience in running or a few because the sole is really tough. The mouvments of the feet arn't the same as a normal pair of shoe.
Finaly, I think that this invention only has good points because it shows how fast and how far the science can go.
